name: Player character "Kokoro Hata" / 玩家角色「秦心」 / プレイヤーキャラ「秦こころ」 (Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-)
detailed_description:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Player character
･Kokoro Hata

Equipments
･Emotional Grave

Spell Cards
･Gloom Mask, "The Man of Qi"
･Possession, "Four Humors"

[Attention]
Playable characters could be used from the start for those dungeons without story. They could also be used in dungeon with a story after it is cleared.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
